@Garth Murray is there a specific process that makes an assignment ready to be PDF viewable? I tried a few different assignments on my dev box but never saw a PDF button anywhere, and if I tried to manually load the PDF I'd get the following error:

Facade\Ignition\Exceptions\ViewException Call to a member function followUp() on null (View: /var/www/ondemand/resources/views/pdf/assignment.blade.php)

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1593091851282,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"GRSW-3","entityId":"2-394","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"GRSW"},{"name":"summary","value":"Add News to Homepage of GRS Website"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Kris Anolfo"},{"name":"created","value":"1593027816915"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"3"},{"name":"description","value":"

The homepage of the GRS website does not have any news on it so visitors cannot see when a news update was published. Add a News element to the homepage so this information is visible.

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Kris Anolfo"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Kanolfo"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Kanolfo"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1593027816915"},{"name":"Kanban State","value":["Ready to pull"],"valueId":["Ready to pull"],"color":{"bg":"#e6e6e6","fg":"#888"}},{"name":"Stage","value":["Backlog"],"valueId":["Backlog"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"Kanolfo","fullName":"Kris Anolfo"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"GENERAL-9","entityId":"2-389","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"GENERAL"},{"name":"summary","value":"Revise the Claim Intake Form"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Kris Anolfo"},{"name":"created","value":"1593027206178"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"9"},{"name":"description","value":"

Fields on the Claim Intake Form need to be revised. Change all of the formatted fields to be single line or number fields so they can be integrated with Xact in the future.

In addition, make all fields required except for Mobile Phone and Email Address.

Add the following two questions as dropdown with Yes/No as responses. If Yes is selected for either question then an option to upload documentation needs to appear.

Are there any prior claims that should be considered on this loss?
Are there any policy endorsements that should be considered?

pages of Weather, Property Data and Photos will each need their own PDF created and stored in documents.

For Weather the same layout would work just needs to be on one page

Property Data - Building Codes should be a PDF and the Property Data should be one page

All of this data comes in via API show should be easy to create PDF out of

We need a method in which we are able to create assignments in bulk. This should be done via a csv upload.

Currently data is partially split between the assignments table and the xactimate_assignments table. Since these won't have data from xactimate, we would look into moving the columns from xactimate_assignments to assignments

{"id":"BRSRC-1","entityId":"2-352","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"BRSRC"},{"name":"summary","value":"Dockerise BridgeSource"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Garth Murray"},{"name":"created","value":"1592422081892"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"1"},{"name":"description","value":"

We need to create a solid Docker image that supports at minimum:

Latest version of PHP
Latest version of PostgreSQL supported by AWS
NGINX

We will also need to setup the appropriate gitlab flow for building the docker image and deploying it to the testing environment

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Garth Murray"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"garthpmurray"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"garthpmurray"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1592428084907"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"BRSRC-2","type":"Depend","role":"depends on"},{"value":"BRSRC-1","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Internal"],"valueId":["Internal"],"color":null},{"name":"Ideal days","value":["2"],"valueId":["2"],"color":null},{"name":"Story points","value":["2"],"valueId":["2"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"OD-53","entityId":"2-227","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"OD"},{"name":"summary","value":"Bulk upload of users"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Garth Murray"},{"name":"created","value":"1589294246895"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"53"},{"name":"description","value":"

On the User Management page add an option to bulk upload users. Utilize a similar design as the bulk upload of assignments.

System should loop through csv, extra the necessary data and create the users based on the role column in the csv. Skip admin role type.

Role will determine what fields are required for the user.

If there is an error display the row number and data, if the email already exists inform the user that the email was skipped because it exists.

SELECT * FROM users_deployments WHERE deployment_id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM deployments)

SELECT * FROM users_deployments WHERE adjuster_id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM users)

SELECT * FROM users_deployment_notifications WHERE deployment_id NOT IN (select id from deployments)

SELECT * FROM users_deployment_notifications WHERE adjuster_id NOT IN (select id from users)

Dupont","issueId":"BS-44","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

SELECT users_deployments.id AS user_deployment_id, users.firstname, users.lastname, deployments.incident_name, concat("https://portal.grsbridge.com/adjuster/", users.id) as user_profile_link, concat("https://portal.grsbridge.com/deployments/roster/all/", deployments.id) as user_profile_link FROM users_deployments LEFT JOIN users ON users.id = users_deployments.adjuster_id LEFT JOIN deployments ON deployments.id = users_deployments.deployment_id WHERE users_deployments.active = 1 AND adjuster_id IN ( SELECT adjuster_id FROM users_deployments WHERE active = 1 GROUP BY adjuster_id HAVING count(deployment_id) > 1 ) ORDER BY adjuster_id

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1590001043312,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"4-65","author":"rdupont","authorFullName":"Rick Dupont","issueId":"BS-44","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Added some CSVs of user data. Looks like there were 9 users set as "active" in deployments that didn't exist, all admins. Set those to active = 0.

Also discovered 24 adjusters with multiple deployments set as active. Created a CSV and sent to @Kris Anolfo for further research.
